comments:
I20030813

Found in .log. The live Synch view was empty even though there were changes. I
had to switch to list mode and back to get the tree. No dialog in the UI.

The critical part is that the view stays empty until doing the switch dance.

Fixed. The SyncSet data structure wasn't thread safe :)

As for a dialog not showing, that is workbench default behavior. See the
ExceptionHandler::openQuestionDialog() there is a flag for handling throwable
exceptions. By default they are simply logged.

Adjusting the target milestone and severity since those were from the original 
bug.

Synchronization has been added to a few other methods that wee missing it 
(members, getAllOutOfSync). Fix has been released to HEAD.
